menu_item.descript: 2 eggs cooked to order, organic potatoes, your choice of meat, your choice of bread and roasted tomatoes.
a toasted bagel with your choice of cream cheese, lox, cucumber, a slice of tomato, red onion, and capers.
with red potatoes, carrots, red onion, celery, dill and house made pickles.
with tomato, basil, garlic, and homemade cashew pesto sauce.
with dried apricots, cranberries, lemon-mango vinaigrette, lavender oil, green beans and parsley.
with tuna, lemon, thyme, olives, tomato and cucumber.
with fennel pollen, red potatoes, haricot vert and herbed pesto.
with toasted cashews, green onions, snap peas, flax seeds, tamari sesame oil and tahini.
large red beets tossed with white truffle oil, red onion, olive oil and garlic.
with feta, olives, tomato, cucumber, and roasted red pepper. comes with house dressing on the side.
ham, broccolini, fresh arugula, pepper jack cheese, and arugula oil on grilled foccacia.
turkey, half an avocado, provolone and roasted red pepper remoulade on toasted foccacia.
a fried egg on top of 2 strips of bacon, cabot sharp white cheddar cheese, tomato gastrique, caramelized onions, oven dried cherry tomatoes, and mayo. served on grilled focaccia.
ham, turkey, pepper jack cheese, pickled jalape–os, onions and horseradish aioli on toasted focaccia
bacon, cheddar, half an avocado, tomato, caramelized onions, mayo and mustard on grilled foccacia
crispy fried tofu topped with a pickled daikon-carrot mixture, cilantro aioli and a drizzle of birds eye chili. served on a grilled whole wheat multigrain baguette.
half an avocado, sweet and spicy mango sauce, smoked red peppers, grilled red onion and lettuce, on a toasted whole wheat multigrain baguette.
barbeque marinated slices of tofu, chipotle aioli, grilled red onions, and a hearty slathering of brooklyn standardÕs own vegan potato salad. served on a toasted whole wheat multigrain baguette.

homemade kalamata olive and garlic tapenade, grilled sweet peppers, pea sprouts, scallion feta cheese and sweet saffron spread on a grilled whole wheat baguette. *tell us to "make it vegan" and weÕll leave off the cheese.

seitan marinated in a moroccan spice rub, grilled and then topped with caramelized onions, swiss cheese, and horseradish aioli . served on a toasted multigrain baguette with mushroom jus on the side for dipping. *tell us to "make it vegan" and weÕll leave off the cheese.

a marinated and grilled portobello mushroom with pea sprouts, tomato gastrique, chevre, oven dried tomatoes and asparagus spread. served on a toasted whole wheat multigrain baguette. *tell us to "make it vegan" and weÕll leave off the cheese.
jamaican jerk marinated seitan, pickled red cabbage, caramelized sweet onions, romaine lettuce and smoked red pepper remoulade on a toasted multigrain baguette.
brooklyn standardÕs own homemade hummus, tomato, cucumber, pickled red cabbage, romaine lettuce and a birds eye chili drizzle on grilled foccacia.
